bootstrap_languagecode.description: Please go to http://usrz.github.io/bootstrap-languages/ and then find the code for your lanaguge. This may not be the same as the "ISO Language Code/Tag/". For instance, for the ISO Code/Tag of "en-US" the Bootstrap Code/Tag is "en"

bidi_dir.description: The text direction for the current locale, either "ltr" for left-to-right languages such as English or "rtl" for right-to-left languages such as Japanese.

bidi_reversed_dir.description: If the `bidi_dir` is "ltr", then this is "rtl"; otherwise, it's "ltr".

bidi_start_edge.description: If the `bidi_dir` is "ltr", then this is "left"; otherwise, it's "right".

bidi_end_edge.description: If the `bidi_dir` is "ltr", then this is "right"; otherwise, it's "left".

addon_desc.message: Set personal system wide hotkeys to trigger customizable actions.

startupfailed_body.message:
Trigger cannot be used because it failed to startup.

$REASON$

REASON.example: one of the entries from the startupfailed_ stuff below

startupfailed_unknown.message: The error is unknown. Please see "Browser Console" for more details. Try restarting the extension to fix this problem.

startupfailed_execonnectinstall.message:
Failed to connect to executable: $CONNTECT_REASON$

Tried to copy executable files but this also failed: $INSTALL_REASON$

startupfailed_exemismatch.message: Version of installed executable ($EXEVER$) does not match extension ($EXTVER$). Automatic executable update failed ($REASON$). $HOWTOFIX$

startupfailed_exemismatch_howtofix1.message: Please manually upgrade the executable *OR* downgrade the extension.

startupfailed_exemismatch_howtofix2.message: Please manually downgrade the executable *OR* upgrade the extension.

message_installed.message: '$COMMAND_NAME$' command successfully added to your hotkeys

modal_msg_grade_firstline.message: You currently have a locally modified version installed.

modal_msg_grade_lastline.message: If you feel your edits are an enhancement, please cancel installation, and share it with the community.

modal_msg_downgrade_midline.message: The changes in your version are newer then the latest public version.

modal_msg_upgrade_midline.message: The changes in your version are based on a version that is older than the latest public version.

authmsg_unknown.message: An unknown status happend. Please report this as an error on the support page at - https://github.com/Noitidart/Trigger/issues

authmsg_denied_github.message: You will not be able to share any new commands you make. Nor can you share any commands you edit. You can still download from the commmunity though.

authmsg_approved_github.message: You can now share/upload to the community new commands you make and any updates/edits to commands you downloaded.

myhotkeys_page_description.message: From here you can add commands. You can then assign hotkeys to the commands. Commands can be written or gotten from the shared community, click the "+" icon to get started.

oauth_manager_description.message: Github powers the community due to it's excellent version control. You can add commands from the community without an acccount. However, if you want to share your newly created or edited commands, you must grant permission.

sentence1_maxhotkeysenabled.message: You have reached your max enabled hotkeys limit of $MAX_HOTKEY_COUNT$ hotkeys.

sentence2_maxhotkeysenabled.message: You can purchase more for %DOLLA%1 USD each.

message_startrans.message: Establishing connection with transcaction and Paypal servers...

message_failtrans.message: Failed to connect to transaction servers.

sentence1_entercode.message: Enter the code given to you on purchase:

github_auth_needed.message: You need to authorize your Github account. Authorize now?

github_shared_success.message: Succesfully shared! Pending approval. Open approval topic in new tab?

github_shared_fail.message: Failed to share, error returned was: "$ERROR$"

invalidpage_message.message: You have reached a page that does not exist.
